438: Job Summary: MaineGeneral Health. We’re With You. Be With Us MaineGeneral Health is a comprehensive non-profit system with the mission of enhancing, every day, the health of our patients, our families and our communities. If you are looking for the opportunity to support your friends, family, and your community through your work at MaineGeneral Health...Come be with us. The Role: MaineGeneral Health is currently seeking a Medical Laboratory Technician/Technologist to join our team of professionals. We are a CAP accredited, 24/7 lab that is responsible for over 1 million tests annually for the central Maine Community. Built around a people first model – we are committed to our employees’ well-being, growth, work-life balance. MGH offers established career ladders and ongoing commitment to our employees. The Opportunity: Heroes work here! MaineGeneral Health is offering an exciting opportunity to work in our state of the art laboratory as a Senior Laboratory Tech in our Microbiology department. MGH is a teaching lab. We have three amazing campuses in the Augusta and Waterville areas. The Work: Serves as a consultant to laboratory staff and other clinical staff as needed. Performs precise diagnostic/analytic testing and collection of specimens. Interprets, documents and reports test results. Performs and evaluates quality control testing and executes instrument maintenance and troubleshooting. Verifies analytic accuracy, precision, sensitivity for test methods. Provides excellent communication and interpersonal skills with all laboratory personnel, internal and external customers. Utilizes problem solving and critical thinking to ensure quality management standards are met. You Have: Certification by American Society of Clinical Pathologists -; Medical Laboratory Technician: MLT (ASCP) OR Medical Laboratory Scientist: MLS (ASCP) or MT (ASCP) required. OR Certification by American Medical Technologists -; Medical Laboratory Technician: MLT (AMT) OR Medical Technologist: MT (AMT) required. 3-5 years Microbiology experience preferred.
